name: iSale Template
summary: Learn about .ISALETEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can choose a pre-designed template or save a layout as a template for future use. To choose a template, select File → New Auction → With Template and choose a template from the categories. To save a layout as a template, select Layout → Save Layout as Template. This action will save your current layout as another template.

description: Template created by iSale, an application that assists you in selling items through eBay; contains a layout used to present items on eBay; organized under different categories, such as Beauty, Books, Fashion, and Music.
